About.title: One team, one vision
About.lead:
PKT was founded in 2016 and entered its first competitions in the KartSport Circuit championship. In just a few years, driven by growing demand and continuous development, the team evolved from an amateur spirit into a professional structure, stepping up the level of karting events and achieving notable results in the Easykart championship.

In recent seasons, thanks to the passion of its founder Stefano Matteuzzi and the commitment and dedication of the whole team, PKT has raced in multiple championships, expanding its know-how and building a solid organization ready for new competitive challenges.

Our mission is to develop and train young drivers to face national and international races with professionalism and discipline. We work in synergy to offer our clients professionalism, quality, efficiency and elegance, supporting them in achieving their goals.

assistance.title: Assistance
assistance.lead:
In racing, being ready is everything. With our assistance service we support you from preparation to the race weekend on track, taking care of set-up, checks and operations.
Essential equipment is prepared by the team: you travel light and focus on driving and performance, with no stress and no unnecessary load.
points: Complete trackside support throughout the race weekend
Equipment and essentials prepared by the team
Travel with peace of mind: you arrive and everything is ready
assistance.noteText: We reduce the organizational load and increase the quality of your track time: more focus, more continuity, more results.
assistance.highlightText: We take care of everything and support you at every stage: perfectly organized equipment, 360° technical support, coaching with telemetry and video analysis, and a clear development path to help you grow and improve consistently—aiming for success at national and international level. The goal is simple: to put you on track in the best possible conditions.
assistance.miniLeftText: Helmet, clothing and whatever you need to feel comfortable on track.
